column4: I have a Compaq Presario Laptop, and to the best of my knowledge, it has an ATI Rage Mobility 128 video card with 8 megs of VRAM. How do I find out if Ubuntu works with my video card?
google
thank you, i'll try that now
yw (I think it works with Ubuntu, as far as I can recall)
darth_gimp: don't you just love dosbox?
It's amazing. I love it :)
lovely. Have you tried the other DOS Emulator though?
between running SCUMM based dos games on DOSBOX and SCUMM based games in SCUMMVM, what would you go for?
I would run Scumm based games in Scumm - it works smoother :)
And I've tried dosemu a year or two ago. It worked okay, but not for old games and graphical applications
that's what I thought - what SCUMM games do you have at the mo?
I've got Beneath a Steel Sky and Queen of the Amazone Jungle...
don't you mean flight of the amazon queen?
but I've heard rumors of a very nice torrent that includes all the games in one huge package... ;)
yeah, that one
torrent? i have to look now!! :P
i've got monkey island 2 though
monkey island 2 is a fantastic game, but I guess we're getting offtopic now ;)
right then, im installing cedega atm, i need to get some more packages, eg. flex, bison
well, I've never installed cedega
he ended up installing the server distro
